00016 // .NAME vtkTesselateBoundaryLoops - tesselate boundary loops, aka, fill in surface holes.
00017 // .SECTION Description
00018 // This filter will convert boundary edges that form a  closed loop into tesselated polygons. It will not
00019 // smoothly interpolate over a surface hole.
00020 
00021 
00022 
00023 #ifndef __vtkTesselateBoundaryLoops_h
00024 #define __vtkTesselateBoundaryLoops_h
00025 
00026 #include "vtkPolyDataAlgorithm.h"
00027 #include "vtkBioengConfigure.h" // Include configuration header.
00028 class vtkFeatureEdges;
00029 class vtkCleanPolyData;
00030 class vtkStripper;
00031 class vtkPolyData;
00032 class vtkTriangleFilter;
00033 class vtkAppendPolyData;
00034 class vtkReverseSense;
00035 
00036 
00037 
00038 class VTK_BIOENG_EXPORT vtkTesselateBoundaryLoops : public vtkPolyDataAlgorithm
00039 {
00040 public:
00041   vtkTypeRevisionMacro(vtkTesselateBoundaryLoops,vtkPolyDataAlgorithm);
00042   void PrintSelf(ostream& os, vtkIndent indent);
00043 
00044   // Description:
00045   // Constructor
00046   static vtkTesselateBoundaryLoops *New();
00047   
00048   // Description:
00049   // Set the tolerance for point merging of line verts... if line verts aren't exactly coincident
00050   // they wont be joined up into a loop. With a tolerance they can be incouraged to be coincident.
00051   vtkSetMacro(Tolerance, float);
00052   vtkGetMacro(Tolerance, float);
00053   
00054   // Description:
00055   // Set the maximum number of lines in a loop. Default is 1000;
00056   vtkSetMacro(MaximumLength, int);
00057   vtkGetMacro(MaximumLength, int);
00058   
00059   //Description:
00060   // Append the tesselated loops to the input dataset. Default is Off.
00061   vtkSetMacro(AppendTesselationToInput, int);
00062   vtkGetMacro(AppendTesselationToInput, int);
00063   vtkBooleanMacro(AppendTesselationToInput,int);
00064   
00065   // Description:
00066   // Reverse the sense (front/back face) of the loops being tesselated
00067   vtkSetMacro(ReverseSense, int);
00068   vtkGetMacro(ReverseSense, int);
00069   vtkBooleanMacro(ReverseSense, int);
00070   
00071   // Description:
00072   // Sometimes boundary edges are non-manifold and need to be included
00073   vtkSetMacro(NonManifoldEdges, int);
00074   vtkGetMacro(NonManifoldEdges, int);
00075   vtkBooleanMacro(NonManifoldEdges, int);
00076   
00077   // Description:
00078   // Get the number of boundary loops 
00079   vtkGetMacro(NumberOfLoops, int);
00080   
00081 protected:
00082   vtkTesselateBoundaryLoops();
00083   ~vtkTesselateBoundaryLoops();
00084 
00085   vtkFeatureEdges *FeatureEdges;
00086   vtkCleanPolyData *Clean;
00087   vtkStripper *Stripper;
00088   vtkPolyData *tmpPolyData;
00089   vtkReverseSense *Reverse;
00090   vtkTriangleFilter *Tesselator;
00091   vtkAppendPolyData *Append;
00092   vtkCleanPolyData *Clean2;
00093   
00094   float Tolerance;
00095   int AppendTesselationToInput;
00096   int ReverseSense;
00097   int MaximumLength;
00098   int NumberOfLoops;
00099   int NonManifoldEdges;
00100   
00101   // Usual data generation method
00102   int RequestData(vtkInformation *, vtkInformationVector **, vtkInformationVector *);
00103 
00104 private:
00105   vtkTesselateBoundaryLoops(const vtkTesselateBoundaryLoops&);  // Not implemented.
00106   void operator=(const vtkTesselateBoundaryLoops&);  // Not implemented.
00107 
00108 };
00109 
00110 #endif
